website_summaries.verdict: A well made toy that provides hours of fun and imaginative play.
pros: Set includes Catwoman figure, whip, motorcycle, and pet cat
Cat bike can be transformed into chase mode with the click of a button
Bike shoots forward on its own when you pull it backward
Durable and well made to handle falls
cons: Whip and pet cat are quite small and easy to lose

customer_reviews.title: Five year old very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Imaginext toys were not in my radar until my son got a few sets he loves and has been playing with probably for the last two years. I like that you can add on these little figures as their imagination changes. Cat Woman is a current fave and I love that we could just get her and her specific accessories, instead of a whole set.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Meow 🐱
customer_reviews.text: Imaginext toys are top of the line. I think this will be passed down to the next generation.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly St. John Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My little ones love these imaginex toys. They're durable and a great value
customer_reviews.author: Brian mulville

customer_reviews.title: my toddlers are happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It's been a great toy for my toddler boys, they really enjoy it. It seems like its quality made and the bike is cool (although like another reviewer said it is kind of hard to tell that catwoman is a female but perhaps that is on purpose to avoid any possible controversy?) But I think 20 dollars for such a small toy is way overpriced even if the shipping is free.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I had thought it would be. Was easily lost by my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Fun times with Catwoman!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to the bat cave my son already had. Now we have regular Batman vs Catwoman fights.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Renee Klepac

customer_reviews.title: Finally a girl character to play with
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old son, from his sisters, but they play with it mostly because his Batman Imaginext collection didn't have any girl characters to play with. They both jockey for position between this character and Poison Ivy. The motorcyle is cool and they like that she has a whip. Great addition to his set and makes them more willing to play with him. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These things are just too darn cool! What more could a nerdy parent ask for
customer_reviews.text: I have bought way too many Imaginext figures. These things are just too darn cool! What more could a nerdy parent ask for? This catwoman is ADORABLE and the bike works great... and my destructo child has NEVER (knock on wood) broken an imaginext toy. IMPRESSIVE!
customer_reviews.author: Bubblegumbanshee

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have Cat woman..
customer_reviews.text: My grandson says we gotta have the Catwoman, because i( grandma) cannot keep playing with boys toys. I need a girl toy. lol! So now i am Catwoman who will help Batman to get my way at times or i might be a little deceitful and help the joker or penquin too. But i have to kick my supercharged Cat cycle in High gear to out run Batmans Batcopter..living a super friends life can sometimes be as hectic as being Grandma. lol! Fun and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: MeMaw Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in expected time, excellent for super heros little fans.
customer_reviews.author: csingleton

customer_reviews.title: Catwoman Super Hero
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr. old grand daughter love it ! Very well made, easy to stand and play with. Uses it to play with her brother & his superhero play sets. She brings the "girl power"
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Just how it looks!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson picked this out so I got it for him. At first he was disappointed and asked me what I got for HIM. He told me this Catwoman was for his sister for playing with him. How very sweet. So he picked out one for himself and he gave this one to his sister. They both loved it then.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: So glad I could find this here!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a huge Batman Imaginext collection. We have been gradually adding on to it for years! We have been saying, "If only there were a Catwomen!" for years!! We were so excited when we found this here and ordered it immediately. We were not disappointed. She is high quality like all Imaginext toys and has been played with often.
customer_reviews.author: MJones

customer_reviews.title: My brother loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my little brother. He has most of the other figures from the set but kept asking for "Batman's girlfriend" so I ordered this online. I'm happy that they had at least one female toy to add to the collection. Maybe the new Wonder Woman movie will mean more female toys. The toy is fun to play with and is a cool addition to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Both my son and daughter love this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki VinHatton

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. He has a crush on ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He has a crush on Catwoman. He is in denial that she is marrying Batman this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Pro-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Cool Catwoman
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great. It is hard to find Catwoman in the stores, so glad I found it on Amazon. I don't know that superhero figures are that eduational, but that isn't why I bought it. It does encourage imaginative play & thats good.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Vacek

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, what my son wanted. Prime 2 day shipping Rocks!!! Thank you. Just in time for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Dorschug

customer_reviews.title: These are so great to go with his play houses and other characters
customer_reviews.text: My son loves imaginext characters. These are so great to go with his play houses and other characters.
customer_reviews.author: Cara J. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: cool looking toy!
customer_reviews.text: Son was excited to get this for his birthday! very nice toy seems to be well made and will go great with his bat cave! He is a big bat man fan! Fisher Price has made another great Imaginext toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Girls & Boys Love It
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 yr old son because he has all the other imaginex batman toys and loves them. He was totally surprised because when i ordered this was not in the stores yet. But my 8 yr old daughter was happier than him because finally there is a girl toy for batman! She loves to play with him but gets sick of not having agirl figure to play with with. This little toy solved so many issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ajullrobber

customer_reviews.title: Imaginext DC Super Friends Catwoman
customer_reviews.text: See review regarding Fisher-Price Imaginext Castle Basic - Bad Knight and Wolf . Needed more villians. Catwoman is very hard to find, and came with a vehicle and additional figure. A definite winner!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves these toys
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves all the Imaginext DC Super Friends! My daughter hasn't seen Catwoman in stores, and there are so few female super heros, that we had to order it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My children love Superheros, the girls and my boy. These toys are durable and the kids 7,4,and 2 love them. Also having girls its nice to see girl characters.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Super Hero Girl is great
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves that there is a Super Hero Girl in his group of Super Hero Guys. Also likes the little cat that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made out of good plastic but the small pieces are easy to lose like her whip and cat but other then that she stays on her bike great too
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: She like catwoman a lot
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these action figures. We've been searching for girl superheros so they can play together. She like catwoman a lot.
customer_reviews.author: momma r

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: My Grand loves these Imaginext toys. The Batcave was a huge success.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty lame toy but I purchased it as more of a display. Catwoman plays the part of Mary in our Xmas nativity. If it wasn't for that, I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mueller Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old son has a crush on cat woman and loves this little set :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my 4 year olds growing collection
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to add a girl into the mix of the imaginext batman friends my son has for his bat cave. One of his favorite toys overall-he really enjoys playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my daughter she plays with my son and his batman castle but never had any girl players till we looked here on amazon and found a variety of girl super heroes. Now she has her own characters to play with.
customer_reviews.author: steelfan

customer_reviews.title: batman
customer_reviews.text: this was the only one I could not find in the stores... its a great addition to my sons batman collection
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece so she would have a figure to play with my batman obsessed son. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Package matches the picture
customer_reviews.text: this is a present for my son. He has a lot of heros, but no villans. The bike looks neat, and Catwoman is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: It's a toy. My Daughter love it. There isn't much more to say about this, but I need to add more words to get rid of this review.
customer_reviews.author: Briedo

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves this toy. It is easy to use and fun to play with. It is well made, too. I love all of the imaginext's toys!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Figure Fits the Bill
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old. He enjoys it. The bike transforms a bit but is a solid part. The whip and cat are too small for my liking (I have an 18 month old as well). Other than that I suggest this toy for the parent who kids love Batman.
customer_reviews.author: Gaming Dad of 2

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it!
customer_reviews.text: We finally found this for my son..he had been looking everywhere. We got it fast and it is just as we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat woman Lives on!
customer_reviews.text: This catwoman toy is a fun addition for the BatCave. Grandson has many of the Batman characters & is enjoying them all.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Imaginext is great!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love all of the Fisher Price Imaginext toys! This little Catwoman toy is a great addition to the Batcave, which my younger son adores.
customer_reviews.author: M. Randall

customer_reviews.title: ... my grandson and he loves cat women Was a great hit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson and he loves cat women Was a great hit
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Lievsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves having a superhero to play along side older brother.
customer_reviews.author: TMS-G

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: My son always plays with batman so we got this for our daughter so she can play along. She loves cat woman. Good quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: MamaHugs

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son. He loves it. It came on time and was packaged well. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Than-q-45

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Batman Set
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have a female character. The bike is a fun addition
customer_reviews.author: KScout

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves playing with all the accessories that go along with the imaginext bat cave. Products are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Coz Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Purr-fect plaything
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little toy that goes to the Imaginext series of Batman toys. It's a lot of fun to play with. The cycle is neat and easy for tiny hands to use. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Hedden

customer_reviews.title: imaginext catwoman
customer_reviews.text: my son has been asking for this toy before it even came out. we have the batman imaginext toys, and he really wanted catwoman. i kept telling him there is no catwoman buddy. well i got online one day and for the hell of it, decided to look to see if imaginext made it yet. well, there it was. i purchased it right away, and my little guy loved it. wouldn't put it down. if your kids are into batman imaginext, its a must have.
customer_reviews.author: antonio rivera

customer_reviews.title: My girl's son loves the action figure and motorcycle, ...
customer_reviews.text: My girl's son loves the action figure and motorcycle, never puts it down and so far has survived his rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Merriett

customer_reviews.title: CATWOMAN
customer_reviews.text: A HUGE SUCCESS. SMALL BUT PERFECT FOR SMALL FINGERS. FIGURE DID RESEMBLE CATWOMAN WELL. MOTORCYCLE HAS TO BE PLAYED WITH TO WORK CORRECTLY
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kadlac

customer_reviews.title: Likes this toy
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this toy cause it came with a cat and he keeps asking my to play with him
customer_reviews.author: tiana velarde

customer_reviews.title: Imaginext DC Super Friends Catwoman
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Allof the Imaginext products are made well and kids love them. I bought this for my 3 year-old niece after she played with my grandson's and loved it. She even sleeps with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: DC Super Friends
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my 4 year old son to go with his collection of batman and he loved it. He plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Grissam

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Toy has tiny details which is fun
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Toy has tiny details which is fun. My child just loved the toy. Would definite buy again or any imagine toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lmba

customer_reviews.title: my son loved seeing Catwoman with his bat cave on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, brand new in the package; my son loved seeing Catwoman with his bat cave on Christmas morning!!
customer_reviews.author: Lanette Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Imaginext Catwoman
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see this on here and got it to go with our Bat Cave. A couple days after I ordered it, they had it stocked at our local department store for about $9 cheaper and that bummed me out. Other than the price rip-off, it's a fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I think it's great they're including women superheroes now, but this seemed to not really look much like a woman. If they'd done something different with the face - maybe lips or something,.. Besides that, it didn't really interest my kids. The motorcycle barely moved. It was just overall unappealing.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Amazon had the best price and availability
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves these characters. Amazon had the best price and availability.
customer_reviews.author: Marina J LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Seller is Easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Have been purchasing these action figures for my nephew. Its nice when the ordering is made easy, and goes smoothly from beginning to end.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: cat woman
customer_reviews.text: He loves this! Action figures are his thing! He's wanting to get all of the ones available to have the complete set. Little by little we are addind to our collection
customer_reviews.author: TtKkmom

customer_reviews.title: Hot Item toy extremely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a hot item this Christmas but to be taken advantage of is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: My son luved it!
customer_reviews.text: my youngest boy likes the toy a very mutch he has other toys and plays with them all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to our Bat Cave
customer_reviews.text: I will have one happy 5 year old at Christmas. This will complete his set of figures for his bat cave.
customer_reviews.author: PUNKYFISH

customer_reviews.title: ... present but I know it is going to be perfect, thank you
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present but I know it is going to be perfect, thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jones

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends, Catwoman
product_meta.description: Where there are DC Super Heroes, there are villains-and Catwoman makes the "purr-fect" villain on her cool transforming cycle as she rolls through the streets of Gotham City! Kids can rev up the action in their pretend adventures when they press a button to transform this sleek and stealthy cycle for "chase mode"!.
feature_bullets: Includes Imaginext Catwoman figure, cycle, cat, and whip
Add to the fun with more Imaginext DC Super Friends! (Each sold separately and subject to availability)
Create non-stop adventures by expanding your Imaginext world!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars194 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
